content.question: The Metropolitan Museum of Art/Purchase, Lila Acheson Wallace, Drs. Daniel and Marian Malcolm, Laura G. and James J. Ross, Jeffrey B. Soref, The Robert T. Wall Family, Dr. and Mrs. Sidney G. Clyman, and Steven Kossak Gifts, 2008 The work shown can be identified as

choices.label: an ndop portrait figure created by the Kuba peoples
an Ikenga shrine figure created by the Igbo peoples
a byeri reliquary figure created by the Fang peoples
an Nkisi n’kondi power figure created by the Kongo peoples

content.answer: an Nkisi n’kondi power figure created by the Kongo peoples

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
